chav1961.purelib.fsys

Class RMIFileSystemServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • chav1961.purelib.fsys.RMIFileSystemServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RMIDataWrapperInterface, Closeable, Serializable, AutoCloseable, Remote

    public class RMIFileSystemServer
extends UnicastRemoteObject
implements RMIDataWrapperInterface, Closeable

    This class is a server to the FileSystemOnRMI class. It's constructor gets an URI to register in the RMI server, and and nested file system will be controlled by the FileSystemOnRMI client on the server side. The last path of the URI is a remote server instance id and it should be used in the FileSystemOnRMI constructor to get access to the registered server

    Since:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961
    See Also:
    FileSystemInterface, FileSystemOnRMI, JUnit tests, Serialized Form
